name: Eco-Bot
description:
The idea for this game was developed for the 2020 Immersive Learning Research Network (ILRN) game jam, with theme "Earth Reborn". However, we decided to take the development further to achieve a more polished game.

Eco-Bot is a level-based puzzle game that finds its inspiration from Disney & Pixar movie WALL-E (2008). The aim is to clear the path to the plants in each level by pushing and pulling the metal blocks blocking the way.

The game features 16 levels and a load/save system, which keeps track of the cleared levels and their best scores. An option is also available to "Clear all progress" in order to reset the high scores. Finally, the game features different control schemes to choose from and the possibility to undo up to 100 moves during gameplay.

A special achievement is available for each level if the player manage to complete the it within the maximum number of moves specified. How many can you do? ;)
